TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ScrollEventType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the behavior that caused a event for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>. The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>. The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button. For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members. The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType EndScroll = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType First = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The moved to the position of the . For a vertical , this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed. This movement corresponds to a in a vertical and a in a horizontal .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType LargeDecrement = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of , to the left for a horizontal or upward for a vertical . For a vertical , this movement occurs when the page button that is above the is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a . For a horizontal , this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the is pressed, and corresponds to a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType LargeIncrement = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of , to the right for a horizontal or downward for a vertical . For a vertical , this movement occurs when the page button that is below the is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a . For a horizontal , this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the is pressed, and corresponds to a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType Last = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The moved to the position of the . For a vertical , this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed. This movement corresponds to a in a vertical and a in a horizontal .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType SmallDecrement = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The moved a small distance, as determined by the value of , to the left for a horizontal or upward for a vertical . For a vertical , this movement occurs when the upper is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a . For a horizontal , this movement occurs when the left is pressed, and corresponds to a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType SmallIncrement = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The moved a small distance, as determined by the value of , to the right for a horizontal or downward for a vertical . For a vertical , this movement occurs when the lower is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a . For a horizontal , this movement occurs when the right is pressed, and corresponds to a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType ThumbPosition = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the . This movement corresponds to the . To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType ThumbTrack = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The was dragged and caused a event. A event of this may occur more than one time when the is dragged in the .
